name: jackcompiler
description: Jack Language Compiler II: Code Generator

scripts.cleanall: npm run clean && npm run cleanxml && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.cleanxml: rm -rf files/Average/*.xml && rm -rf files/ComplexArrays/*.xml && rm -rf files/ConvertToBin/*.xml && rm -rf files/Pong/*.xml && rm -rf files/Seven/*.xml && rm -rf files/Square/*.xml

author: David Lin
